Description: Mad Libs Serverless Game Stack - development

Properties.Description: Generates story templates using AWS Bedrock
Fills story templates with player words
Generates images using AWS Bedrock Nova Canvas - Parsed API key

Fn::Join: Lambda function for auto-deleting objects in

OriginAccessControlConfig.Description: OAC for Mad Libs website bucket
OriginAccessControlConfig.Name: MadLibsServerlessdevelopmentWebsiteOAC591F54AB

DynamoDBTableName.Description: Name of the DynamoDB table for game data

StoryGenerationFunctionArn.Description: ARN of the Story Generation Lambda function

ImageGenerationFunctionArn.Description: ARN of the Image Generation Lambda function

WebsiteBucketName.Description: Name of the S3 bucket for static website hosting

ImagesBucketName.Description: Name of the S3 bucket for AI-generated images

CloudFrontDomainName.Description: Domain name of the CloudFront distribution

Region.Description: AWS region where resources are deployed

BootstrapVersion.Description: Version of the CDK Bootstrap resources in this environment, automatically retrieved from SSM Parameter Store. [cdk:skip]

Assertions.AssertDescription: CDK bootstrap stack version 6 required. Please run 'cdk bootstrap' with a recent version of the CDK CLI.
